translation: pomocniczy [providing necessary support to the main work or activities of an organization]
sentence: Campaigning to change government policy is ancillary to the charity's direct relief work.

translation: udręka, cierpienie [extreme unhappiness caused by physical or mental suffering]
sentence: His anguish at the outcome of the court case was very clear.
He set a brisk pace and we struggled to keep up.

translation: upiększać [to make something more beautiful by adding something to it; to add or change some details of a story, usually to make it more interesting or exciting]
sentence: He couldn't resist embellishing the story of his accident a little.

translation: wychudły, wychudzony [very thin, especially because of sickness or hunger]
sentence: Her face was gaunt and grey.

translation: seplenienie [a speech fault in which the sound “s” is pronounced “th”]
sentence: She spoke with a slight lisp.

translation: zwarty [literary; pressed closely together, usually in lines]
sentence: We flew over the city with its serried ranks of identical grey houses.

translation: snopek (też: plik) [a number of things, especially pieces of paper or plant stems, that are held or tied together]
sentence: The corn was cut and tied in sheaves.

translation: drwić z, szydzić z [to intentionally annoy and upset someone by making unkind remarks to them, laughing unkindly at them, etc.]
sentence: The youngest in the group was taunted mercilessly.

translation: kręg [one of the small bones that form the spine]
sentence: The vertebra has a neural canal less than half the diameter of the centrum.
